document.author: L.J. SpRveu
document.title: TQI Required Basic Knowledge Level Questionnaire (Partial List)

questions.question: What is the philosophy behind TQI?
questions.answer: Satisfaction at the lowest employee levels, open communication.

questions.question: What is the goal of Q-500?
questions.answer: Processes and products for work beyond 500.

questions.question: What was the purpose behind development of Q-500 Principles?
questions.answer: Ensure everyone is involved to meet guidelines.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Department Implementation Module I (Principles Module)?
questions.answer: Module I is to align workflows and techniques for context and simulation success, proper use of SPC systems.
